news_header: U.S. equities saw gains in January, with the S&P 500 nearing record highs despite mixed earnings reports. The market is influenced by tariffs, AI developments, and economic data.
news_text: In January, U.S. equities ended higher, with the S&P 500 approaching record highs. The equal-weighted S&P outperformed the official index, and small-caps showed recovery. Gold and Bitcoin futures rose significantly. The market was affected by new tariffs announced by the Trump administration and concerns about AI developments impacting tech stocks. The Fed maintained benchmark rates, and mixed earnings reports showed a slight overall earnings growth. The economic outlook remains cautious as new tariffs and inflation data are closely monitored.
